Subject: Verify Your Bank Account Now

Dear Customer, We noticed unusual activity on your account. Please confirm your identity to avoid restrictions: http://secure-bank-verify.com/login

Thank you, Your Bank Security Team (variation 1)

Subject: Immediate Action Required: Account Login

Hi, A suspicious login attempt was detected on your PayPal account. Verify your details here: http://paypa1.com/verify-login

PayPal Support (variation 2)

Subject: Your Amazon Package Couldn’t be Delivered

Hello, Your recent order requires verification to be delivered. Click the link to confirm: http://amaz0n-delivery.com/confirm

Amazon Delivery Team (variation 3)

Subject: Facebook Account Alert

Hi, We detected a login attempt from a new device. Confirm it’s you immediately: http://faceb00k-security.com/login

Security Team Facebook (variation 4)

Subject: Subscription Payment Failed

Hello, We couldn’t process your subscription payment. Update your payment info to avoid service interruption: http://netf1ix-billing.com/update

Subscription Services (variation 5)

Subject: DHL Delivery Notification

Dear Customer, Your parcel could not be delivered. Verify your address here to receive it: http://dhl-delivery.com/verify

Subject: Your Flipkart Order Has Been Shipped

Hello, Your order #FB123456 has been shipped and will arrive by September 2. Track your package: https://www.flipkart.com/track-order

Flipkart Team (variation 2)

Subject: Dinner Plan

Hey, Are we still on for dinner tonight at 8 PM? Let me know if you need a change in timing.

Friend (variation 3)

Subject: Your Monthly Account Statement

Dear Customer, Your account statement for August is now available. No action is required. https://www.bankofindia.com/account-statement

Bank of India (variation 4)

Subject: Weekly Newsletter: Tech Updates

Hi Subscriber, Here are the top tech news and updates for this week. Stay informed! https://technewsletter.com/weekly

Subject: Flight Booking Confirmed

Hello, Your flight to Hyderabad on Sept 10 has been confirmed. Check your itinerary: https://www.airindia.in/booking
